title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 that cover end-to-end syntactic parsing and its importance for semantic role labeling (SRL) and machine translation
**"Deep Biaffine Attention for Neural Dependency Parsing"**
This paper introduces a deep biaffine attention mechanism for dependency parsing, which is crucial for syntactic parsing

author.literal: **"End-to-end Neural Coreference Resolution"** - Lee, K., He, L., Lewis, M., & Zettlemoyer, L.

title: Discusses an end-to-end approach to coreference resolution, which is closely related to syntactic parsing

author.literal: **"A Minimal Span-Based Neural Constituency Parser"** - Stern, M., Andreas, J., & Klein, D.

title: Presents a span-based approach to constituency parsing, useful for understanding syntactic structures

author.literal: **"Deep Contextualized Word Representations"** - Peters, M. E., et al.

title: Introduces ELMo, which improves various NLP tasks including syntactic parsing and SRL
Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"**
BERT's contextual embeddings have been shown to improve syntactic parsing and SRL performance

author.literal: **"Syntax-aware Neural Semantic Role Labeling"** - Strubell, E., Verga, P., Belanger, D., & McCallum, A.

title: Explores the integration of syntactic parsing into neural SRL models
**"Jointly Predicting Predicates and Arguments in Neural Semantic Role Labeling"**
Discusses the importance of syntactic information for SRL
**"End-to-End Neural Network Based Dependency Parsing Using Dynamic Oracles"**
Focuses on end-to-end dependency parsing with dynamic oracles

author.literal: **"Self-Attention with Relative Position Representations"** - Shaw, P., Uszkoreit, J., & Vaswani, A.

title: Enhances transformer models with relative position representations, improving syntactic parsing
**"Universal Dependencies: A Cross-Linguistic Perspective"**
Discusses the Universal Dependencies framework, which is essential for syntactic parsing across languages
**"Transition-Based Dependency Parsing with Stack Long Short-Term Memory"**
Introduces a transition-based dependency parser using LSTMs
**"A Fast and Accurate Dependency Parser using Neural Networks"**
Presents a neural network-based dependency parser
**"Neural Architectures for Named Entity Recognition"**
While focused on NER, the techniques are relevant for syntactic parsing
**"Improving Neural Machine Translation Models with Syntax-Aware Embeddings"**
Discusses the integration of syntactic parsing into neural machine translation

author.literal: **"Syntax-Based Statistical Machine Translation"** - Galley, M., et al.

title: An early work on incorporating syntax into statistical machine translation
Explores the use of Combinatory Categorial Grammar (CCG
**"A Neural Network Approach to Jointly Model Syntax and Semantics"**
Joint modeling of syntax and semantics for improved parsing and SRL

author.literal: **"Tree-to-Sequence Attentional Neural Machine Translation"** - Eriguchi, A., et al.

title: Incorporates syntactic tree structures into sequence-to-sequence models for machine translation
**"Syntax-Aware Encoder Representations for Neural Machine Translation"**
Enhances encoder representations with syntactic information for better translation quality
**"Joint Syntactic and Semantic Parsing with Neural Networks"**
Discusses a joint model for syntactic and semantic parsing using neural networks
These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the advancements in end-to-end syntactic parsing and its applications in SRL and machine translation
